script.name: csv.code.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$data = get global variable: name='hack.code.data'
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $data = table alloc $guesses = array alloc: size=0 $data['guesses'] = $guesses gosub sub.GenerateCode
set global variable: name='csv.hacking.status' value=2 set global variable: name='hack.code.data' value=$data gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == 'hacking.code.menu' $selection = $a.data[0] if $selection == 'solve' START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=9090 priority=30 set global variable: name='csv.hacking.status' value=3 else if $selection == 'abort' START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=9091 priority=30 end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] if $selection == 'guess' $tries = $data['tries'] dec $tries = $data['tries'] = $tries
$correct = 0 $wrongplace = 0 $current = 1 while $current <= 4 $v = sprintf: fmt='code.%s', $current, null, null, null, null $code.peice = $data[$v] $v = sprintf: fmt='value.%s', $current, null, null, null, null $guess.piece = $data[$v] if not $guess.piece $data[$v] = 0 $guess.piece = $data[$v] end
if $code.peice == $guess.piece inc $correct = else $i = 1 while $i <= 4 if $i != $current $v = sprintf: fmt='code.%s', $i, null, null, null, null $test = $data[$v] if $test == $guess.piece inc $wrongplace = break end end inc $i = end end inc $current = end
$aGuess = array alloc: size=7 $guess.piece = $data['value.1'] $aGuess[0] = $guess.piece $guess.piece = $data['value.2'] $aGuess[1] = $guess.piece $guess.piece = $data['value.3'] $aGuess[2] = $guess.piece $guess.piece = $data['value.4'] $aGuess[3] = $guess.piece $aGuess[4] = $correct $aGuess[5] = $wrongplace $v = 4 - $wrongplace - $correct do if $v < 0 $v = 0 $aGuess[6] = $v $guesses = $data['guesses'] append $aGuess to array $guesses
$data['value.1'] = 0 $data['value.2'] = 0 $data['value.3'] = 0 $data['value.4'] = 0
if $correct >= 4 $data['solved'] = [TRUE] play sample 968 set global variable: name='csv.hacking.status' value=3 START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=9090 priority=30 $input = create menu return to previous menu: value='solved' return $input else play sample 929
if $tries <= 0 $guesses = array alloc: size=0 $data['guesses'] = $guesses $read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10922 display subtitle text: text=$read.text duration=5000 ms START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=133 priority=20 gosub sub.GenerateCode end
gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] $data[$selection] = $value
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='hack.code.data' value=null $status = get global variable: name='csv.hacking.status' do if $status == 2 set global variable: name='csv.hacking.status' value=1 end
return null
sub.BuildMenu: $menu = create custom menu array
$values = array alloc: size=10 $values[0] = 0 $values[1] = 1 $values[2] = 2 $values[3] = 3 $values[4] = 4 $values[5] = 5 $values[6] = 6 $values[7] = 7 $values[8] = 8 $values[9] = 9
$read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10955 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text set menu option: $menu, icon=33 set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10902 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text add value selection to menu: $menu, text='1:', value array=$values, default=0, return id='value.1', width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] add value selection to menu: $menu, text='2:', value array=$values, default=0, return id='value.2', width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] add value selection to menu: $menu, text='3:', value array=$values, default=0, return id='value.3', width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] add value selection to menu: $menu, text='4:', value array=$values, default=0, return id='value.4', width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] add section to custom menu: $menu
$guesses = $data['guesses'] if $data['solved'] $aGuess = get last item in array: $guesses $v1 = $aGuess[0] $v2 = $aGuess[1] $v3 = $aGuess[2] $v4 = $aGuess[3] $guess = sprintf: fmt='%s %s %s %s', $v1, $v2, $v3, $v4, null $read.text = sprintf: pageid=3212 textid=10904, $guess, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='solve' else $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='guess' $read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10956 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret $read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10911 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='abort' end
$read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10905 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text if not size of array $guesses $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text else $size = size of array $guesses $i = 0 while $i < $size $aGuess = $guesses[$i] inc $i = $text.cols = array alloc: size=9
$text = sprintf: fmt='%s.', $i, null, null, null, null $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=30 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[0] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[1] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=50 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[2] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=70 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[3] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[3] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=90 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[4] = $text.col $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=120 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=null text='|' $text.cols[5] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[4] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=160 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Green] text=$text $text.cols[6] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[5] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=190 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Yellow] text=$text $text.cols[7] = $text.col $text = $aGuess[6] $text = convert number $text to string $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=220 length=20 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Red] text=$text $text.cols[8] = $text.col add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.cols end end
$read.text = read text: page=3212 id=10909 $input = create input: id='hacking.code.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$a.obj callback=[Callback.All] endsub
sub.GenerateCode: $rnd = random value from 0 to 10 - 1 $data['code.1'] = $rnd $rnd = random value from 0 to 10 - 1 $data['code.2'] = $rnd $rnd = random value from 0 to 10 - 1 $data['code.3'] = $rnd $rnd = random value from 0 to 10 - 1 $data['code.4'] = $rnd $rnd = random value from 12 to 19 - 1 $data['tries'] = $rnd endsub return null

add custom menu heading to array
